author: sanjiva
msg: fixed a bug where a 400 error code was being returned instead of
the 500 required by SOAP.

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix bug deserializing nulls of type "ur-type", which are generated when
the VectorSerializer finds nulls inside a Vector.  Bug submitted by
Francisco Jose Avila-Desarrollo (favila@gridsystems.com).
Code-level changes:
1) Add UrTypeDeserializer, which only deserializes null xsd:ur-type's
2) Update SOAPMappingRegistry to map UrTypeDeserializer as the
default xsd:ur-type deserializer.

author: duftler
msg: Fixed a bug which caused the DeploymentDescriptor.toXML(...) method to
print invalid XML when serializing a deployment descriptor describing
a Messaging (i.e. non-RPC) service.

author: duftler
msg: Fixed a bug that was causing services provided by user-defined providers
to be listed as scripts, with a null listed as the actual script.

author: duftler
msg: Fixed a bug where DeploymentDescriptor.toXML(...) invoked on a deployment
descriptor describing a user-defined provider would print (as a child
of the <isd:provider> element):
<isd:a.b.C class="abc/Def"/>
instead of:
<isd:java class="abc/Def"/>
